name: Melinda's Adventure DA Edition
description:
Melinda's Adventure - DA Edition

Use your magical power of transformation to solve puzzles and avoid enemies.

A GAME BY ZACK RUNKLE
(c) 2019 BYZARRU - byzarru.weebly.com
DO NOT REPOST THIS GAME. All rights reserved.

CREDITS

Zack Runkle - Project Lead, Game, Story, Asset Design, Game Art, Programming, Music
James Clark - Game Art, Playtesting

NOTES

Controls and additional information is presented ingame.

This game features gamepad support. This game is designed for Xbox and Playstation controllers but other system and third party controllers may work as well.

This game was made for DA 427 Game Design II during the Spring semester at LSUS.
